name: Jobs
description: [center]Explore various professions, earn coins, and unlock valuable skills by taking on different jobs.[/center]

common.name: Endeavors of the Common
common.description: Work for the common people and make a living through humble yet essential jobs.

knight.name: Order of the Knights
knight.description: Join the prestigious Order of the Knights, progress through the ranks, and become a formidable force.

noble.name: Echelons of Eldoria
noble.description: Ascend to the ranks of nobility in Eldoria, obtaining wealth and recognition.

arcanic.name: Sanctum of the Arcanists
arcanic.description: Explore magic's mysteries in the Sanctum. Train under skilled spellcasters, unlocking new powers daily.

heroic.name: Hall of Heroes
heroic.description: The place where the heroes of the past rest. The heroes have left their legacy here and you can learn them, provided you pass their test.
